Gatekeeper Bella:
Initially, about your pet - a wolf. So you need to know something about the wolves.
Wolves are carnivorous mammals of the family of dogs. This class is very diverse, including dogs, raccoons, foxes, jackals. We do not know the life expectancy of wolves in the wild, but in captivity they live 12-15 years.
That's all I had to say. If you are interested in something else go to Gludio and learn from Guard Brynn.
